name: broadcaster
description: WhatsApp Bulk Marketing Desktop Application with White-Labeling & Distributor Support
author: Broadcaster Team

scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install -w main && npm install -w api && npm install -w ui
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev -w api" "npm run dev -w ui" "npm run dev -w main"
scripts.build: npm run build -w main && npm run build -w api && npm run build -w ui
scripts.test: npm run test -w api && npm run test -w ui
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w api && npm run lint -w ui && npm run lint -w main
scripts.precommit: npm run lint && npm run format
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run dist && gh release create
